title: Pledge

tokens.lyric: My fallen figure shames the earth;

lines.raw: [D]My fallen figure shames the earth;

tokens.lyric: Once I was born, yet never I lived,

lines.raw: [G]Once I was born, yet never I lived,

tokens.lyric: Never forsaking, You came to me

lines.raw: [D]Never forsaking, You came to me

tokens.lyric: Giving my life and breaking my chains

lines.raw: [G]Giving my life and breaking my chains

tokens.lyric: Tenderly You gathered me up;

lines.raw: [Bm]Tenderly You gathered me up;

tokens.lyric: Filled with love and sweating blood,

lines.raw: [F#m]Filled with love and sweating blood,

tokens.lyric: Ever patient, You taught me the word,

lines.raw: [Bm]Ever patient, You taught me the word,

tokens.lyric: Carved in my heart, it forever remains.

lines.raw: [D]Carved in my heart, it forever remains.

tokens.lyric: Never I knew what life should be;

lines.raw: [Em]Never I knew what life should be;

tokens.lyric: All I can do is follow your way.

lines.raw: [A7]All I can do is follow your way.

tokens.lyric: When on the path, I stumble and fall,

lines.raw: [D]When on the path, I stumble and fall,

tokens.lyric: Turning, You give the courage I need.

lines.raw: [G]Turning, You give the courage I need.

tokens.lyric: Though the path is narrow and steep;

lines.raw: [Bm]Though the path is narrow and steep;

tokens.lyric: Cruel thorns leave a trail of blood.

lines.raw: [F#m]Cruel thorns leave a trail of blood.

tokens.lyric: Still I pledge I will follow the way,

lines.raw: [Bm]Still I pledge I will follow the way,

tokens.lyric: Follow as far as my Father will lead.

lines.raw: [D]Follow as far as my Father will lead.

tokens.lyric: Freed from a sleep so deep and dark,

lines.raw: [Em]Freed from a sleep so deep and dark,

tokens.lyric: gladly I wake to knowing your will.

lines.raw: [A7]gladly I wake to knowing your will.

tokens.lyric: Though death may stab me time and again,

lines.raw: [D]Though death may stab me time and again,

tokens.lyric: Nothing can change a loyal heart.

lines.raw: [G]Nothing can change a loyal heart.

tokens.lyric: This I pledge, my life is for You;

lines.raw: [Bm]This I pledge, my life is for You;

tokens.lyric: For Your will I rush forward to die.

lines.raw: [F#m]For Your will I rush forward to die.

tokens.lyric: This I pledge till the struggle is done,

lines.raw: [Bm]This I pledge till the struggle is done,

tokens.lyric: 'Till we proclaim the victorious day.

lines.raw: [D]'Till we proclaim the victorious day.
